I have heard of 3 kids tales (10th grade) of how uneffective uniforms are.
 
 They say it doesnt help one bit-
 
 Kids still get into their little groups and cliques- they still make fun of other kids. 
 
 Instead of making fun of their clothes- they make fun of other more personal things. The way they talk, walk, look, and act.
 
 Even if all kids looked exactly the same- theyd still do the things they do.

how about if the uniforms came with side arms? :) 
 
 
 
I have heard of 3 kids tales (10th grade) of how uneffective uniforms are.
 
 i guess it comes to what the reason for them is. i would have thought that nobody would be dumb enough to think uniforme would help stop bulling/ making fun of others.
